sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import ReactDOM from "react-dom"; import axios from "axios"; import "../styles/RSVPModal.css"; export default function RSVPModal({ open, onClose }) { const [yes, setYes] = useState(""); const [no, setNo] = useState(""); const [firstAssistant, setFirstAssistant] = useState(""); const [secondAssistant, setSecondAssistant] = useState(""); const [thirdAssistant, setThirdAssistant] = useState(""); const [fourthAssistant, setFourthAssistant] = useState(""); const [fifthAssistant, setFifthAssistant] = useState(""); const [sixthAssistant, setSixthAssistant] = useState(""); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const objt = { yes, no, firstAssistant, secondAssistant, thirdAssistant, fourthAssistant, fifthAssistant, sixthAssistant, }; axios .post( "https://sheet.best/api/sheets/07556802-d700-4a70-80e8-9db1c62e8e40", objt ) .then((response) => { console.log(response); }); }; if (!open) return null; return ReactDOM.createPortal( <>

¿Asistís a la fiesta?

setYes(e.target.value)} > setNo(e.target.value)} >

Indicanos quienes asistirán / no asistirán
  • setFirstAssistant(e.target.value)} >
  • setSecondAssistant(e.target.value)} >
  • setThirdAssistant(e.target.value)} >
  • setFourthAssistant(e.target.value)} >
  • setFifthAssistant(e.target.value)} >
  • setSixthAssistant(e.target.value)} >
, document.getElementById("portal") ); }
